p: In addition, although unclear as whether it is beneficial or detrimental to the host cell, SARS-CoV have been shown to activate host stress response, apoptosis, and autophagy ( 13). These are also various pathways that may also need to be evaluated therapeutically in the context of the current pandemic. Relatedly, we have shown that chloroquine, which also inhibits the autophagic cellular flux by decreasing autophagosome-lysosome fusion, can inhibit Influenza-mediated CCL5 production ( 64).
